name: squibview
description: SquibView is a light weight editor which live-renders mardown (including code, diagrams, etc) or HTML to a browser
author: deftio (https://github.com/deftio

scripts.test:e2e: npx concurrently -k --success first --names "HTTP,E2E" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npx http-server -p 8000" "wait-on -t 300000 -i 2000 http://127.0.0.1:8000 && jest -c e2e-tests/jest.config.cjs --ci"
scripts.test:cli: node cli/bin/squibv.js dev/sample-content.md -o /tmp/squibv-test.html && echo 'âœ“ CLI test passed'
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:cli
scripts.build:lib: npm run updateVersion && npm run makeIndexHTML && rollup -c && npm run minifyCSS
scripts.build:all: npm run build:lib && npm run build:cli
scripts.build:fast: npm run updateVersion && rollup -c --environment BUILD:esm && npm run minifyCSS
scripts.build:umd: npm run updateVersion && rollup -c --environment BUILD:umd && npm run minifyCSS
scripts.build:esm: npm run updateVersion && rollup -c --environment BUILD:esm && npm run minifyCSS
scripts.build:standalone: npm run updateVersion && rollup -c --environment BUILD:standalone && npm run minifyCSS
scripts.prerelease: npm run build:all && npm run test:all
